title: Producing fake PCR test reports: Two millionaires remanded
content: Colombo Fort Chief Magistrate Priyantha Liyanage, on Tuesday (22) remanded till 8 March, two millionaire businessmen who were produced before him, by the CID, on charges of producing fake PCR test reports and thereby amassing a sum of Rs 5 million.The two suspects have been charged with the bogus compilation of PCR reports, similar to those that are issued by a leading private hospital here, which are submitted for BIA officers prior to departure.The two suspects were identified as residents of Darga town and Kalutara. The CID informed Magistrate Liyanage, that their probe into the incident had revealed that the two suspects had compiled around 1,000 fake PCR reports, having illegally used the QR Code of PCR reports released by a leading hospital.
